name: Alchemist Dedication
description: You put your alchemical knowledge to use, gaining access to basic alchemy and the ability to craft alchemical items.

dedicationFeat.name: Alchemist Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You become trained in Crafting and gain the Alchemical Crafting skill feat. You gain the alchemist's infused reagents class feature, gaining a number of batches of infused reagents equal to your level. You also gain a formula book with 4 common 1st-level alchemical formulas.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Concoction
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level alchemist feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Advanced Concoction
additionalFeats.description: You gain one alchemist feat of your choice. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your alchemist level is equal to half your character level.

additionalFeats.name: Expert Alchemy
additionalFeats.description: Your proficiency rank for Crafting increases to expert, and you can create alchemical items up to your level - 3 (instead of your level - 5).

name: Barbarian Dedication
description: You channel your inner fury, gaining the barbarian's rage and combat prowess.

dedicationFeat.name: Barbarian Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You become trained in Athletics and gain the Rage action. You can Rage as the barbarian class feature, gaining a +2 bonus to damage with melee Strikes and taking a -1 penalty to AC. You can use this ability once per day, and your rage lasts for 3 rounds.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Fury
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level barbarian feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Advanced Fury
additionalFeats.description: You gain one barbarian feat of your choice. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your barbarian level is equal to half your character level.

additionalFeats.name: Instinct Ability
additionalFeats.description: You gain the instinct ability for a barbarian instinct of your choice. If the instinct ability requires a specific weapon, you're trained in that weapon.

name: Bard Dedication
description: You gain access to occult spellcasting and the bard's muse-inspired performances.

dedicationFeat.name: Bard Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You cast spells like a bard, gaining a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the occult spell list. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells. Your key spellcasting ability is Charisma. You become trained in Occultism and Performance.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Bard Spellcasting
additionalFeats.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for bard. At 4th level you gain a 1st-level spell slot.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Muse's Whispers
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level bard feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Inspire Courage
additionalFeats.description: You gain the Inspire Courage composition cantrip, which grants allies within 60 feet a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects for 1 round.

name: Champion Dedication
description: You follow a deity and champion their cause, gaining divine protection and the ability to shield your allies.

dedicationFeat.name: Champion Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: Choose a deity and cause as a champion would. You become trained in light armor, medium armor, and the Religion skill. You gain the champion's reaction associated with your cause (such as Retributive Strike for paladins).

additionalFeats.name: Basic Devotion
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level champion feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Champion Resiliency
additionalFeats.description: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each champion dedication feat you have. As you continue your champion training, you gain additional Hit Points.

additionalFeats.name: Healing Touch
additionalFeats.description: You gain the devotion spell lay on hands. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast. You gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

name: Cleric Dedication
description: You embrace your deity's divine power, gaining access to divine spellcasting and the cleric's font of healing or harm.

dedicationFeat.name: Cleric Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You cast spells like a cleric, gaining a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the divine spell list. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for divine spells. Your key spellcasting ability is Wisdom. You become trained in Religion.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
additionalFeats.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for cleric. At 4th level you gain a 1st-level spell slot.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Dogma
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level cleric feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Divine Breadth
additionalFeats.description: You can cast more divine spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from cleric archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

name: Druid Dedication
description: You attune to the natural world and gain primal spellcasting, following one of the druidic orders.

dedicationFeat.name: Druid Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You cast spells like a druid, gaining a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the primal spell list. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for primal spells. Your key spellcasting ability is Wisdom. You become trained in Nature and gain the Druidic language and a druidic order.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Druid Spellcasting
additionalFeats.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for druid. At 4th level you gain a 1st-level spell slot.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Wilding
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level druid feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Order Spell
additionalFeats.description: You gain the initial order spell from your druidic order. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

name: Fighter Dedication
description: You train in the ways of martial combat, gaining proficiency with weapons and the fighter's combat techniques.

dedicationFeat.name: Fighter Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You become trained in all martial weapons. You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics, and you gain the Attack of Opportunity reaction.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Maneuver
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level fighter feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Advanced Maneuver
additionalFeats.description: You gain one fighter feat of your choice. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your fighter level is equal to half your character level.

additionalFeats.name: Fighter Resiliency
additionalFeats.description: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each fighter dedication feat you have. As you continue your fighter training, you gain additional Hit Points.

name: Monk Dedication
description: You study martial arts, gaining the monk's unarmed combat techniques and inner focus.

dedicationFeat.name: Monk Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You become trained in unarmed attacks and gain the Flurry of Blows action. You can use Flurry of Blows to make two unarmed Strikes using one action. You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Kata
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level monk feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Advanced Kata
additionalFeats.description: You gain one monk feat of your choice. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your monk level is equal to half your character level.

additionalFeats.name: Monk Resiliency
additionalFeats.description: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each monk dedication feat you have. As you continue your monk training, you gain additional Hit Points.

name: Ranger Dedication
description: You adopt the ways of a ranger, learning to track prey and fight with precision in the wild.

dedicationFeat.name: Ranger Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You become trained in Survival and gain the Hunt Prey action. You can use Hunt Prey to designate a creature you can see or track as your prey. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your prey and to Survival checks to Track your prey.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Hunter's Trick
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level ranger feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Advanced Hunter's Trick
additionalFeats.description: You gain one ranger feat of your choice. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your ranger level is equal to half your character level.

additionalFeats.name: Ranger Resiliency
additionalFeats.description: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each ranger dedication feat you have. As you continue your ranger training, you gain additional Hit Points.

name: Rogue Dedication
description: You train in the rogue's subtle arts, gaining proficiency in stealth and the ability to exploit weaknesses.

dedicationFeat.name: Rogue Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You become trained in Stealth, gain a skill feat, and gain the rogue's Surprise Attack class feature. If you already have Surprise Attack, you instead gain a 1st-level rogue feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Trickery
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level rogue feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Sneak Attacker
additionalFeats.description: You gain the sneak attack class feature, dealing an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures. This increases to 2d6 at 6th level.

additionalFeats.name: Advanced Trickery
additionalFeats.description: You gain one rogue feat of your choice. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your rogue level is equal to half your character level.

name: Sorcerer Dedication
description: You awaken the power of your bloodline, gaining access to spontaneous spellcasting from your innate magical heritage.

dedicationFeat.name: Sorcerer Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: Choose a bloodline. You become trained in the bloodline's two skills, gain the bloodline's initial bloodline spell as a focus spell, and cast spells from a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the tradition associated with your bloodline. Your key spellcasting ability is Charisma.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting
additionalFeats.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for sorcerer. At 4th level you gain a 1st-level spell slot.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Blood Potency
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level sorcerer feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Bloodline Breadth
additionalFeats.description: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more spells of your bloodline's tradition each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from sorcerer archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

name: Wizard Dedication
description: You study arcane magic, gaining access to a spellbook and the wizard's prepared spellcasting tradition.

dedicationFeat.name: Wizard Dedication
dedicationFeat.description: You cast spells like a wizard, gaining a spellbook with four common arcane cantrips of your choice. You can prepare two of these cantrips each day. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane spells. Your key spellcasting ability is Intelligence. You become trained in Arcana.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Wizard Spellcasting
additionalFeats.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for wizard. At 4th level you gain a 1st-level spell slot that you can prepare from your spellbook.

additionalFeats.name: Basic Arcana
additionalFeats.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level wizard feat of your choice.

additionalFeats.name: Arcane Breadth
additionalFeats.description: You can prepare more arcane spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from wizard archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.
